JOB DESCRIPTION: This role requires working predominantly on maintenance and support of Equinitis core platforms and products and handling Incidents and Service Requests raised by the Business and support teams . Business Functions:EQ Sirius US programme (Vega) scope is defined as the various outputs (Products) that will be created by the Work Streams that will enable the clients to be migrated from the FIS Sunstar system to the EQ Sirius systems. To deliver a transitional architecture that supports current (Sunstar) and new (Sirius) EQ solution platforms during the migration transition.The successful candidate will demonstrate the following experience, skills and behaviours:  Should have minimum 4+ years of experience in development and maintenance of applications using Microsoft .Net Platform using C#.  Experience in Object Oriented Programming .Net Framework 4.0 & above.  Experience in C# ASP.NET WCF Html5, CSS3, JavaScript and JQuery. SQL Server (2019 desirable) Microsoft Visual Studio (2019 desirable) Team Foundation Server Exposure to Ticket tracking tools like SCSM.  should be familiar with the Waterfall/V-Model SDLC process . Overall, the role requires 80% of the effort into support and maintenance of applications and 20% into software development. Should be willing to work in US working hours
